articles.title: Champions League draw: Real Madrid get Man City; Barça get PSG - ESPN - ESPN India
articles.description: Manchester City were drawn against Real Madrid in the quarterfinals of the Champions League on Friday in a tie that sees the most recent winners of Europe's premier competition take on its most successful side.
